body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        Students learn how to play kōnane (Hawaiian checkers).            Every Kid in a Park Aloha fourth graders! In celebration of the National Park Service turning 100, we want to invite every fourth grader and their family to visit America's national sites for free. Learn more about the Every Kid in a Park program at, https://everykidinapark.gov/ .
